item.title: Self Introduction
item.description: I often got asked about “tell me about yourself” and I got awkward and don’t know where to start, so I am thinking why don’t I just have a dedicated page to tell a bit about myself, so here it is. Of course I’m biased, as my view conflicts with my own interest ðŸ˜ƒ. Growth Mindset I stumbled on this video just a year ago, it has illustrated the
